content: अविकल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Unimpaired, not defective, entire, perfect, whole, all; तानींद्रियाण्यविकलानि <ls>Bh. 2. 40</ls>; <ls>Pt. 5. 26</ls>; °लं फलं <ls>Me. 24</ls>, <ls n="Me.">34</ls>; °शरच्चंद्रमधुरः <ls>Māl. 2. 11</ls> full, full-orbed; °इंद्रियः <ls>K. 35</ls>, <ls n="K.">71</ls>; <ls>Mv. 2. 17</ls>, <ls n="Mv.">4. 29</ls>; °लमरक्षत् <ls n="Mv.">5. 5</ls> entirely, completely; यल्लोकेष्वविकलमाप्तमाधिपत्यं <ls>Ki. 18. 36</ls> entire, supreme. {@--2@} Regular, orderly; consistent, not discordant; कलमविकलतालं गायकैर्बोधहेतोः <ls>Śi. 11. 10.</ls>
